name: Cap
description: A beautiful feathered cap that will never fall out of fashion.

description: Made from magical vegan leather.

name: Steel Helm
description: Great for protection you from distractions in your peripheral vision.

description: Day labor chic.

description: Expresses what jerkins and tunics can't.

name: Boxers
description: Protection from the elements.

name: Shorts
description: A garment worn over the pelvic area, circling the waist and splitting to cover the upper part of the legs, sometimes extending down to the knees but not covering the entire length of the leg.

name: Pants
description: Shorts if they weren't short. AKA 'trousers'.

description: Gives your forearms much needed protection.

description: Gauntlets for those who don't mess around.

name: Steeltoe Boots
description: Provides nice ankle and toe support.

name: Buckler
description: Tiny, round shields for wimps

name: Metal Shield
